Key Match Events: The Kings have a record of 1-5 in their six fastest games, with the one win coming last night against the Memphis Grizzlies.
Pre-Game Insights: Doug Christie emphasized the importance of having pace in the half-court offense as well, not just on the fastbreak.
Post-Match Reflections: The Kings have been able to get back in the win column, and the vibes in Sacramento are back up after a three-game winning streak.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Kings have increased their pace to 101.88 over the last four games, ranking seventh in the league, and have improved their field goal percentage late in the shot clock.
Others: The Kings have no shortage of ways to get a good look out of the half-court offense, with players like De'Aaron Fox, DeMar DeRozan, Malik Monk, and Domantas Sabonis.
